definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Muslim man prayed during at a mosque in Malaga, southern Spain, Monday.
sentences.chinese: 齋月，一名穆斯林男子在馬拉加的一間清真寺內禱告。

sentences.english: I want to ask where does Cains wife came from?
sentences.chinese: 我想問馬拉加妻子來自何方？

sentences.english: When we arrived Malaga airport, it was already 9pm.
sentences.chinese: 當我們到達馬拉加機場時，已經是晚上9點了。

sentences.english: Our apartment was located in Malaga, just very close to the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我們的酒店公寓坐落於馬拉加海濱附近。

sentences.english: Now we were waiting for our flight to Munich at Malaga airport.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們在馬拉加機場等候飛往慕尼黑的航班。

sentences.english: Banderas, 49, was born in Malaga, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 班德拉斯現年49歲，生於西班牙馬拉加。

sentences.english: Now it was ready for landing on Malaga airport.
sentences.chinese: 此刻飛機正準備在馬拉加機場着陸。

sentences.english: Cucumbers for sale at a market in Malaga, Spain, in late May.
sentences.chinese: 黃瓜於在馬拉加，西班牙，市場銷售在5月下旬。

sentences.english: Malaga is a lovely city and the architecture is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉加是個可愛的城市，建築物都很美麗。

definition: La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4

definition: FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
